name: Journey To The Heart's Core
description:
This game is a semi-choose you rown adventure game. Follows the main character as she shourneys across the planer in search of a magical stone to save her sister. On The way she finds the truth about a centuries old feud about her planet and its corruption

The main focus was the idea of having the heart of a hero. The determination, will power, and innocence that comes with having a good heart and hope when all seems lost. The other main focus was the idea of corruption and twisted history. When her knowledge of her planet and it's history is constantly being challenged with each interaction as she learns the real reason why her people are suffering.
